writer.name: 马尔塔·普鲁斯 Marta Prus

director.name: 马尔塔·普鲁斯 Marta Prus

introduction: The day before her eighteenth birthday, Gosia leaves the campus of the Lodz Youth Educational Center to go back home. Her biggest wish is to organize a birthday party together with her boyfriend and her friends. However, the first meeting with her mother ends up in a heated argument. Like a multi-facet mirror, the film shows the different aspects of the young protagonist's personality, delicately portraying the anxieties of a difficult adolescence.
